name: Olive & Company
tag_list: marketing-design, web-design, brand-design, print-design, design-strategy, brand-strategy, email-marketing, web-development
overview:
Olive & Company is a marketing design agency. We optimize our clients’ marketing communications through exceptional design strategy, services and support.

We design all of the touchpoints between a brand and its audience: Logos and identities, websites and applications, email marketing promotions and newsletters, digital and print advertising, brochures and sales collateral, direct mail and much, much more.

Our team has decades of collective expertise, and we know how each individual touchpoint fits into the bigger picture. Our goal is to make a project successful on its own terms and as a component to an overall marketing communications strategy.
